fns-with-duplicated-code.name: "resolves a lazy reference to a resource"
"raises a RuntimeError if it can't find a resource in the resource collection when resolving a lazy reference"
"raises an ArgumentError if improper syntax is used in the lazy reference to its resource"
"raises a RuntimeError if you try to reference multiple resources"
"raises a RuntimeError if you try to reference multiple notifying resources"
"raises a RuntimeError if it can't find a notifying resource in the resource collection when resolving a lazy reference"
"raises an ArgumentError if improper syntax is used in the lazy reference to its notifying resource"

details.longest-fn-loc-name: "resolves lazy references to both its resource and its notifying resource"
details.cc-max-name: "raises an ArgumentError if improper syntax is used in the lazy reference to its notifying resource"
